ingredients.ingredient: 6 carrots, peeled and sliced into 1 inch pieces
1 (1 ounce) package dry onion soup mix
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup

cookingTips: Layer vegetables on bottom of slow cooker to create a bed for the steak to cook on
Quarter potatoes uniformly to ensure even cooking with the steak and vegetables
For a saucier dish, increase water by ¼ cup; for thicker consistency, reduce by the same amount
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What fresh herb garnishes or finishing touches could elevate this nostalgic comfort food without losing its essential character?
